values: woo valentines day who gives a fuck

I'm going to start posting again because well... I'm depressed again.  earlier, i laid awake for hours earlier in the dark of my room pondering ways that i could legitimately kill myself.  ways that i could end this "perceived" suffering without my family being too upset, without my friends being affected.  i came up with a few ideas, but i eventually started crying and gave up.  i took a shower because a few years ago a girl named Marcy reminded me that sometimes when we hate ourselves so much we simply need a "cleansing shower".  it helped a little.  i hated myself less and went downstairs and hung out with my roommates and jimmy and Emily.  i hate that those two are together still; all i can imagine is that he uses her all the time and she gets nothing in return.  all i want is to make a girl happy and want me in her life.  simple mutual affection and enjoyment.  that's all i want, is to feel wanted by someone i want.  its not a selfish conquest or some status thing, i just want to have that bond with a girl.  but i can't.  i can't have anything i want.  this is why i want to die.  i honestly don't see the point in progressing towards... nothing.  which is all i have the ambition for now.  i have become so bitter towards the world and the people in it that i simply want nothing more to do with it.  i do NOT want your pity or false statements of understanding, because it's simply not that simple.  the few people that understand me really don't.  this isn't a cry for help or anything, i could make it private.  i just don't want this in some separate realm from my other posts, because it's all heartfelt.  i wanna say what i have to say without needless worry from others, because anyone who actually has the power to change my mind about this won't.  all the rest are merely people i care about that can't change my mind.  forget the drama, forget the formalities.  this isn't about that.  i just want people to know how i feel.  i want to vent, that's all this is for, so fuck everyone.  i have been kind for too long.  things have changed, and then again they haven't.  so where to go from here?  let's see...  i have no potential in baseball, no desire to form a band and go through any of the same b/s again, no inspiration to draw, and no other reasons to pursue anything else I'm good at.  money's always been tight, and I'm tired of being a burden to my parents financially.  what does someone who has no aspirations anymore do?  i wait to die.  that's where I'm at.  i have forgotten the love of god and the bible, because frankly Christianity has become a joke before my eyes.  hypocrites and liars alike, why would the obvious tendencies of humans to lie and manipulate be excluded from the histories of religion?  we can't even document the truest events accurately.  i hate this existence, i wish for so much more.  i feel our purpose has been tainted by the agendas of awful people.  and now i hate myself for being alive during all of this.  i hate my wasted potential.  i can not bring myself to try anymore, even though i will.  after all i can't let my parents see how far I've fallen.  but if what i say is true, it won't matter anyway.  so fuck off world, i hope we get what we deserve.  i know i have(n't).  but we'll get it whether we like it or not

well life's been interesting lately.  a lot of good things came into my life, one of which was a girl.  but i can't actually be with her even though we like each other, and it sucks.  

let's see...i've gotten over a lot of people lately, quite a few burdens lifted off of my shoulders.

that's it!
i don't know what to write, but i feel bad about a lot of things.  and i feel like a failure.

When there is nothing left to burn
You have to set yourself on fire

God that was strange to see you again
Introduced by a friend of a friend
Smiled and said "yes I think we've met before"
In that instant it started to pour

Captured a taxi despite all the rain
We drove in silence across Pont Champlain
And all of that time you thought I was sad
I was trying to remember your name

This scar is a fleck on my porcelain skin
You tried to reach deep but you couldn't get in
And now you're outside me you see all the beauty
Repent all your sin

It's nothing but time and a face that you'll lose
I chose to feel it and you couldn't choose
I'll write you a postcard, I'll send you the news
From the house down the road, from real love

Live through this and you won't look back
Live through this and you won't look back
Live through this and you won't look back

There's one thing I have to say so I'll be brave
You were what I wanted, I gave what I gave
I'm not sorry I met you
I'm not sorry it's over
I'm not sorry there's nothing to save
I'm not sorry there's nothing to save

this has been the hardest thing i've ever done.  forgetting the person i thought i'd be with forever.  when shes still within reach.  i can try to communicate with her still... its crazy!  so many things remind me of her.  i cant get her out of my head.  i've spent the last couple weeks distracting myself from the thought of amanda.  will has been a big help for me... hes gone through a similar situation and he never acts too busy to listen to me vent about her.  its ridiculous.  so many things are happening in my life and still...she remains at the forefront of my thoughts.

  part of me wishes that she'd read this, or something to remind her of me, and that she'd contact me again.  but realistically its not going to happen.  its weird imagining how someone can move on from you.  and vice versa.

is this the hardest thing i've ever done?

my mind is so shot right now.  i'm not healthy enough for anything mentally.  or anyone.  i'm sure this is all for a reason.

i just wish i knew my reason.

I wish I was free of this
I see her in my dreams
Wish that she wasn't there

But she still haunts me and I

Still feel her breath on me
Still want to taste her skin
But I know that would kill me

No damn her, still I choke on her lies
Still Reeling from her last caress her goodbye

Oh how this sickens me
This wretched fools affair
I can't erase this from me

And now it permeates
And every thought I feel
The anger writhes in my soul

No damn her, still I feel my stomach turn
Choke back hold my head high I'm strong

No damn her, still I choke on her lies
Not reeling I'm strong

No damn her, still I feel my stomach turn
Choke back hold my head high I'm strong

No damn her, still I choke on her lies
Not reeling I'm strong

I wish I was free of this

so i think it's time i started putting down my feelings again.  i've been losing track of how i really feel lately.  i think its because i've been around so many fake people my whole life, i've become fake myself to get by.  

it's crazy.  AOL...AIM...screen names.  facebooks, myspace.  people show how they feel through those.  it's easier to block somebody than to resolve why you don't like them.  or its just not even worth resolving.  that in itself shows how they felt about you from the get-go.  

in a world where i've felt so paranoid about how good a person i am compared to others, these are some of the things that actually get to me.  someone can mess up in so many other ways in person around me, say fucked up shit to my face, etc... but once they block my screen name i know its for real.  hah... it makes me wonder what kind of person i really am to people.  if they view me as some creep that needs a restraining order.  

i hate myself.

And nothing's ever as it seems 
When all your dreams exist in memories

tonight my grandmother died.  it hasn't fully hit me yet, because i happened to be drunk when i got the news.  she was such a beautiful part of my life, someone who always brightened my life up no matter what.  i can't find words to express the magnitude of this loss.  she was so important to me.  i loved her with all of my heart.

she's been in the hospital for months, an infection spread and caused other infections.  then she couldnt breathe on her own.  i will never forget the last time i saw her.

i walked in, she was heavily drugged.  she wouldnt wake up for my aunts and uncles who held her hands and kept calling her name to wake up.  they let me hold her hand, and she gripped it instantly.  after 10 minutes or so of holding her hand and her not waking up at anyone's request, she woke up randomly and looked right at me.  she smiled and motioned at me to kiss her.  i leaned in, and gave her a kiss and she kissed me back.  through all the years growing up, i never kissed her back.  at christmas time she'd always ask me for a kiss and i'd always been like "hah hah" and let her kiss me.  i never returned it.  this time however, i kissed her and she looked at me and smiled so brightly.  then she passed out again at random, still holding my hand.  that was the last time i saw her, a month ago.

i was scared to see her again, in such pain.  i didnt wanna change my last memory of her, cuz we all knew she was going to go.  then my dad called me tonight with the news.  i don't know what to think.

this year has been so hard.  i've had 3 friends die, and others leave me for personal reasons.  but none has hit me so hard as this.  i'm going to miss you so much Nama.

Your eyes, 
they see right through me
There's no need for inspection, 
there are no surprises here

There was a time 
When I thought 
we saw eye to eye
But assumption led me to letdown
(I was cast aside)

To you i'm like a problem
with a formula you already know
As long as you fill in the blanks right
I'm not so hard to handle

I wish there was something i could see within myself
something even you could not look through
something that means too much to ignore
that you just couldn't discard

Something that throws you off,
that you can't put your finger on

Something you can't put in a jar
or under a microscope
(That won't fit into your formula)

i'm afraid to face myself, how can i face you?
i'm running in circles
my fear has gotten the best of me
i can't hide it

insecurities dragging me down
taking me to that wretched place
hanging by my heart
tortured by your eyes

all i can see 
are your eyes seeing through me

Your eyes, they follow me to my dreams
I can't see past them
Yet they seldom look at me
never to see what they aren't missing

I've yet to experience a winter chill 
quite as cold as your eyes
Or a summer day as hot 
when they burn right through me 

Your eyes, 
they see right through me
No need for inspection,
there's no surprises here

...and so a reminder of my shortcomings had arrived at my house.  and in the very bed where i lay at night feeling so lost and forsaken, i watched as this reminder engaged another in a verbal dance that will inevitably lead to it's fruition... that may ultimately break my heart.  broken completely and utterly.  why do i care so much?  i can't control the thoughts and desires of others.  i can't even control my own.  and in my mind i know what i should do.  i know what should and should not bother me.  and i know what my problem really is.  and it is now that i decide to cut myself off, little by little,  until i can handle this.  until i am ready to have my heart broken again.

i hate feeling like i'm on an emotional rollercoaster.  why can't things be straightforward?

i'm fucking alone amongst the masses.  i need to learn how to not care.  how not to need anyone.

so i moved out this weekend.  

i live with damien, will, and justin henagan at damiens old house off of albright.  it's really sweet.  i'm out of my house for the first time in my entire life.  

my parents don't think i can manage paying rent and saving money, because i never saved any at home when i lived there for free.  i feel that me not having to pay for anything gave me an excuse not to save, so i ended up taking advantage of them.  so for me to learn to be truly responsible, i need to get out of there and see what it's like.  and thats what i did.  this was the perfect opportunity for me to grow up more than i can at home being babied by my parents.

i'm ready for a change


something is missing in my life.  i have a pretty good idea what it is... and no one can give it to me.  

i need to find a way to focus on what's really important.  i haven't been focusing on anything except for my own selfish wants, and my life is just passing by and working it's way out of control.

i had a dream the other night that i was shot to death.  it was problably the most intensely sad, realistic, perspective changing dream i've ever had.  i could feel the bullet holes.  i could feel my life draining out of me.  i could feel my dad shaking me to hold on and him crying over me.  it made me not want to die anymore

it's been so long since i've sat down and analyzed my life.  typed it out.  spoken about it.  written something.  it's so hard to just think about it.  it always gets jumbled up.  i lose the point i orginally started at.  gotta have it cemented down.  concrete.  charted out.

i need to change

laying down.  long day.  car accident.  2 and a half hour wait with a neck brace on.  head, arms, legs, and chest strapped to a stretcher in a room by myself for those 2 and a half hours.  blah.  vicodin.
here's an update.  my wrist hurts.  i bought a bicycle.  i drive a big truck for a living.  i have my first show with End of the Wake on May 10th.  Allyse is my best friend.

Alas, here is your serenade my darling 
That leaves you speechless and weak.
May it teach you how to feel,
May it remedy your heartlessness,
And may your cries not interrupt this swansong.

This is a call to arms
For all those who recognize romance as,
As a dying scene, who'll take it to their graves;
This is a call to arms
For all who hold this sacrament close,
May our hearts burn on.

How dare you weep,
For it's insincerity that trickles down your face.
Alas, here is your serenade my darling.
And oh, what a long time coming it has been.
This cruel lullaby that shall plague your dreams
And carry me towards revolution.

This is a call to arms
For all those who recognize romance as,
As a dying scene, who'll take it to their graves;
This is a call to arms
For all who hold this sacrament close,
May our hearts burn on.

I'll sing for you the threnody of modern romance.

This is a call to arms
For all those who recognize romance as,
As a dying scene, who'll take it to their graves;
This is a call to arms
For all who hold this sacrament close,
May our hearts burn on.

I watched you walk away
Hopeless, with nothing to say
I screen my eyes
Hoping to see you again

This is my curse (the longing)
This is my curse (to)
This is my curse (the yearning)
This is my curse

There is love burning to find you
Will you wait for me?
Will you be here?

Your silence haunts me
But I still hunger for you

This is my curse (the wanting)
This is my curse (to)
This is my curse (the needing)

There is love burning to find you
Will you wait for me?

Still I want
And I still I ache
But still I wait
To see you again

Dying, inside, these walls 

Can I see your face in these tears? In these tears
And I see your face...

There is love

too often I find myself in the unenviable and deplorable position of evaluating my own self-worth.  it is during this review that I repeatedly conclude that my existence, although enjoyable and on the surface good, is somewhat pointless and full of moments that have since lost their meaning.  marked by moments where I feel incredible and able to control every aspect of my interactions with others, yet more often marked by the downward spiral to a point - a point that I inevitably arrive at every time, that plagues me.  and that point is when I feel worthless.  an extremely low point at which I wonder if the recent events that made me so happy ever really happened.  this such feeling has overcome me tonight.  I think I shall listen to music that brings me back to happier times in the hopes that I will wake up with a feeling of self-worth.

i want to let go of every binding emotion i have right now and just fucking scream at everyone who keeps me on the backburner in their lives.  if you dont have time for me, fuck you.  stop randomly talking to me and saying we're gonna hang out like old times cuz it's getting old.  stop promising me things that you say you have no time for with me but clearly have time for with others.  i am tired of people going against their better judgement to screw up.  it sickens me to hear people talk about each other and being intolerable and imposing their morals on others.  i'm pissed off that i even feel better than anyone out there.  the things i haven't figured out make me a bitter person.  i'm no better than anyone.  i'm probably the last person who should talk.  sometimes i just hate everything about myself and the things and people around me.  right now is one of those times obviously.  things seem okay, but they really fucking aren't.  there is something hugely wrong here and i can't put my goddamn finger on it.  i'd ask someone to help me but i don't think anyone can.  i don't think anyone should help me.  if i haven't figured anything out by now, then i'm a lost cause and that's probably what everyone sees in me.

...and there I am in Shri Lanka, formerly Sirlon, at 3 o'clock in the morning looking for 1,000 brown M&M's to fill a brandy glass, or Ozzy wouldn't go on stage that night.  So, Jeff Beck pops his head 'round the door, and mentions there's a little sweet shop on the edge of town.  

    So, we go - and it's closed.  So there's me, and Keith Moon, and David Crosby breakin' into this little sweet shop, right?  Well, instead of a guard dog, they've got this bloody great big bengal tiger.  Well, I managed to take out the tiger with a can of mace.  

    But the shop owner and his son, that's a different story all together...  I had to beat them to death with their own shoes...  

    Nasty business really, but sure enough, I got the M&M's, and Ozzy went on stage - and did a great show.

And once again you're the epitome of pure self destruction.

Let Go. 
You wouldn't know love if it crushed your fucking chest. 
"Razors, Roses and A Black Tomorrow".

Will you fucking bleed for me when suicide... it's so yesterday.

And lo, tiger woods 2005 hath consumeth all which i had previously known as "Life".  So on this, the day of the Oxen, that which i have forgotten bequeath unto me, a jellybean.

it's hard to find any girls i have anything in common with.

1) Was 2005 a good year for you?-- it started kinda bad but it was okay i guess...not really actually
2) What was your favorite moment of the year?-- i can't pick one

3) What was your least favorite moment of the year? -- probably the whole january-april timespan

4) Where were you when 2005 began? -- at brittany's house

5) Who were you with? -- brittany, shawn, leann, ryan henaghan

6) Where will you be when 2005 ends? -- with friends i guess

7) Who will be with you when 2005 ends? -- my friends i guess

8) Did you keep your new years resolution of 2005? -- i can't remember what it was

9) Do you have a new years resolution for 2006? not that i can think of

10) Did you fall in love in 2005? -- sorta...i think i just liked her a lot 

11) If yes, with who?-- brittany

12) If yes, do they know? -- sure

13) Are you still in love with them? -- no

14) You regret it? -- no

15) Did you breakup with anyone in 2005? -- brittany

16) Did you make any new friends in 2005? -- yeah

17) Who are your favorite new friends? -- shawn was already my friend but he's a lot closer now, jess, and i can't think of anyone else

18) What was your favorite month of 2005? -- don't have one

19) Did you travel outside of the US in 2005? -- no

20) How many different states did you travel to in 2005? -- 2

21) Did you lose anybody close to you in 2005? -- brittany, stopped seeing my friends as much 

22) Did you miss anybody in the past year? -- yeah

23) What was your favorite movie that you saw in 2005? -- the Wedding Crashers

24) What was your favorite song from 2005? -- M.I.A. by Avenged Sevenfold, and Music Box by Thrice 

25) What was your favorite record from 2005? -- This Darkened Heart by All that Remains, i think it came out in 2004 though. City of Evil by A7X, Vheissu by Thrice.  i like them all

26) How many concerts did you see in 2005? -- a few

27) Did you have a favorite concert in 2005? -- Avenged Sevenfold at the NorVa

28) did you drink a lot of alcohol in 2005? -- not a drop

29) did you do a lot of drugs in 2005? -- none at all

30) How many people did you sleep with in 2005? -- one

31) Did you do anything you are ashamed of this year? -- got a 105 mph speeding ticket when i was right next to the cop at a stoplight.  

33) What was the worst lie someone told you in 2005? -- probably that we'd most likely get back together 

34) Did you treat somebody badly in 2005? -- my friends, i was a stressed out dick

35) Did somebody treat you badly in 2005? -- yeah, but i probably deserved it

36) How much money did you spend in 2005? -- probably like 5000 dollars...too much either way

37) What was your proudest moment of 2005? -- beating two other gt mustangs at the same time... both had more work done to them 

38) What was your most embarrassing moment of 2005? -- when i got my shorts i ordered from my work to wear, and they were like daisy dukes. i wore them in front of the store... it was funny, but embarrassing

39) If you could go back in time to any moment of 2005 and change something, what would it be? -- i wouldnt have floored it that night in front of the undercover cop.  i'd work on my skills with the ladies 

40) What are your plans for 2006? -- work, make my car nicer, stay out of trouble till next september so i can keep driving and not go to jail.  get a girlfriend.  i doubt i'll find time for school
i feel let down by everything in my life, i feel let down by everyone around me, and i feel let down by myself most of all... cuz i know it's all my fault

so here i have come again.  to this dumb little online thingy.  to confess my feelings in private to the public.  

am i ever really happy?  this is stupid.

got my ups and downs.  wish i had some consistent feeling in either direction.  i just have this consistent lack of feeling content with shit right now.  

i worked 2 days at the shipyard instead of advance auto this week.  coincidentally the only two days it rained and had 30-40 mph winds.  lovely.  i got paid 17 dollars an hour though to go through a variety of physically demanding and stressful situations.  did like 20 hours of that stuff in two days, so my paycheck should be nice, after they rape the taxes out of it.  see...ups and downs in everything. 

tonight i practiced some more on my new 7 string guitar.  oh yeah, i bought a 7 string guitar.  got it off ebay for $325.  its a Schecter c7+ that they don't make anymore...i think it's like 5 years old.  it's been modified with a vintage tremolo and gotoh tuners and some strap locks.  everything else is normal...its a charcoal sunburst style finish...its quite lovely.  pretty much the only thing i can play on it is unearth, but i can't wait to start messing with my own songs with it.  i can play all my other songs on it but the bigger neck makes my fingers go to the wrong spots a lot, especially on chords.  

been thinking about death a bit lately.  seems like a good alternative to uncertainty.  i'm not saying this like i'm suicidal.  i'm just thinking about death itself.  the concept.  i doubt i'd kill myself.  unless there was a dog running around with an outfit of swords the were pointing straight up.  then i'd run up and belly flop to my death on the poor doggy.  what are the odds of that though?

Standing there, I wiped the fog from the mirror  
Looking at my hands, I saw blood
I look up, and see you staring back at me
You were always there, waiting for me to see you

Feeling like I had abandoned you, I cried
I became angry, I felt abandoned
Carving your face in the floor, I spat on you
Later that night, I fell through your glass ceiling

Dressed in glass, I fell into your arms
You caught me, and I swam in my blood
When your bullet left my skull, the sky turned orange
I left your arms, and dug my way to Hell

You always watched me, especially at night
I would watch the moon, its light incubated my sadness
You always called to me, and I walked even further to drown you out
But tonight, I heard you for what you're worth

I'm tired of failing, tired of searching,
And most of all, I'm tired of being remembered and forgotten all at once
I'm tired of trying, tired of living
So tired that never waking up is the only way I'll find an end to this bullshit

If you read this, even if I don't speak to you often, please post a memory of me.
It can be anything you want, it can be good or bad, just so long as it happened.
Then post this to your journal to see what people remember about you >:)
